document_data.name: Pierstar Hallowhand
document_data.mainbody: '''Pierstar Hallowhand''' was a commander of the [[Maces of Elversult|Maces]] of [[Elversult]] who served the city during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Pierstar had an intimidating presence, with hard-set eyes, a strong jaw, and a powerful moustache.
document_data.Personality:
In most instances, Pierstar was a good judge of character, a trait that was highly valued by his superior in the Maces.

He had a good mind for tactics and led his men bravely in battle. He was not one to leave an ally without support, no matter the danger involved.
document_data.Relationships: He regularly worked with Lady Constable [[Vaerana Hawklyn]], who lead all law enforcement in Elversult.
document_data.History:
In the {{yearlinkName|1364}}, Pierstar worked with Lady Vaerana and hew new [[Harper]] ally [[Ruha]] to work against the efforts of the [[Dragon Cult]] cell in [[Pros]], and their patron [[dracolich]] [[Hethcypressarvil]]. As they began working together, Pierstar helped escort the [[Bedine]] sorceress Ruha safely from Pros, fighting off the Dragon Cultists during their short journey.

Later on when Hethcypressarvil assailed the city of Elversult, Pierstar led the Maces' in a daring charge against the undead dragon. After the dragon's form was defeated, and lay dormant in [[Hillshadow Lake]], Pierstar led the Maces in a final stand against the being at [[Baldagar Manor]], holding it at bay with [[ballista]]e and arrow fire until it could be finally destroyed one and for all by Ruha and her magic.
